Package controller

Class ProductsController

java.lang.Object
controller.ProductsController
public class ProductsController extends Object
Author:
ikojic000 UslugeController class handles the business logic for the UslugePanel GUI. It manages the ArrayList of Product objects, the ProductTableModel for the JTable, the ProductDAO for database operations and the undoStack for undo functionality.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ProductsController(ProductsPanel uslugePanel)
    Constructor for UslugeController class that initializes UslugePanel and ProductDAO objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductsController

      public ProductsController(ProductsPanel uslugePanel)
      Constructor for UslugeController class that initializes UslugePanel and ProductDAO objects. It also gets the list of products from the database and sets it to the productList.
      Parameters:
      uslugePanel - the UslugePanel GUI

  • Method Details

    • getSelectedProduct

      public Product getSelectedProduct(int row)
      Method that returns the selected Product object from the table.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the selected Product object
      Returns:
      the selected Product object

    • setTableData

      public void setTableData()
      Method that sets the table data to the ProductTableModel and displays it in the JTable.

    • setSearchData

      public void setSearchData()
      Method that filters the table data based on the search string entered by the user. If the search string is empty or null, it displays all the products in the table.

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(Product product)
      Method that adds the new product to the database using the ProductDAO object. It also updates the productList and tableModel, clears the fields in the GUI and scrolls the JTable to display the newly added product.
      Parameters:
      product - the new Product object to be added to the database

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(int row)
      Deletes the product at the specified row in the table. Removes the product from the product list and updates the table data. Also creates a command object to undo the deletion and adds it to the undo stack.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the product to delete

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(int row)
      Updates the product at the specified row in the table with the values entered in the UI. Sets the new name and price of the product and updates the database. Also updates the table data to show the updated product information.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the product to update

    • undoCommandAction

      public String undoCommandAction()
      Undoes the most recent product deletion by executing the corresponding undo command object. Adds the deleted product back to the product list and updates the table data. If there are no more undo commands in the undo stack, returns a message indicating that there is nothing to undo.
      Returns:
      a message indicating whether the undo was successful or not
